sections.title: Context & Role in Titan DR
sections.goal: Understand the interviewee's responsibilities, involvement in the Titan DR drills, and their perspective on the project's mission.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your role in the Titan DR project?
How does the disaster recovery scope align with Novereon's mission and values?
What are the key success metrics you personally track during a DR drill?

sections.title: User Experience in DR Drills
sections.goal: Explore how internal and external stakeholders experience the DR process and tooling.
sample_questions: From an internal user perspective, what are the most challenging parts of executing RB-DR-001?
How do you gather and integrate feedback from drill participants?
Have you identified any friction points in the runbook or tooling interfaces?

sections.title: System Architecture & Multi-Region Design
sections.goal: Dive into the technical architecture, especially how multi-region failover interacts with other systems.
sample_questions: Can you describe how Titan DR integrates with Poseidon Networking's mTLS policies?
What dependencies exist on the Helios Datalake or Mercury Messaging during failover?
How do you ensure blast radius containment in a multi-region scenario?

sections.title: Tradeoffs & Constraints
sections.goal: Uncover tradeoff decisions balancing cost, performance, and risk in the DR design.
sample_questions: What cost-performance tradeoffs did you have to make for RTO vs. RPO?
Were there any resource quota constraints from Vesta FinOps that influenced your architecture?
How do you balance sustainable velocity with the need for rigorous DR readiness?

sections.title: Evidence & Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Discuss how evidence from drills and incidents is used to improve the system.
sample_questions: Can you share an example from TEST-DR-2025-Q1 that led to a design change?
How do you document and prioritize improvements post-drill?
What unwritten heuristics have you developed to detect early signs of DR issues?

sections.title: Future Directions
sections.goal: Explore planned enhancements, potential risks, and long-term vision for Titan DR.
sample_questions: What upcoming capabilities are you most excited about adding to Titan DR?
Are there emerging risks that you think will require significant architectural changes?
How do you see the DR experience evolving for end-users in the next two years?
